bibl.title: New Papyri from the New York University Collection: III
P.NYU 2.3
bibl.note: Suite de: ZPE 136 (2001) pp. 125-144, 11 figg. et pl. I. - Texts: 23. Inv. 3 (I, 18). Loan of Money. Karanis, 13.viii.326p; - 24. Inv. 70 (XVIII, 34a). Fragment of a Loan. Provenance unknown (Philadelphia?), IIIp?; - 25. Inv. 89 (X, 87). Loan of Money. Oxyrhynchus, 294p; - 26. Inv. 32 (II, 136a = Wolfe 3). Receipt for a Money Loan. Provenance unknown, 29.vi.103p; - 27. Inv. 468 recto (XX, 3) [= S.B. X, 10492]. Receipt for a Money Loan. Provenance unknown, 15.v.163p; - 28. Inv. 468 verso (XX, 3). Account of Expenses / Medical Prescriptions. Provenance unknown, ca. 165-200p; - 29. Inv. 12 recto (II, 136b) [= P. Coll. Youtie I, 50]. Contract of a Loan With Mortgage. Oxyrhynchite nome, early IIp; - 30. Inv. 12 verso (II, 136b = Wolfe 5). Account. Oxyrhynchus, IIp; - 31. Inv. 453. Account. Provenance unknown, IV/V A.D.; - 32. Inv. 461 recto. Account. Oxyrhynchites?, between 341-374 or 381-ca.397p?; - 33. Inv. 113 (IX, 27). Fragment of an Account. Oxyrhynchite nome, IIp; - 34-35. Inv. ? recto and verso (XIX, 1) [ed.: Lionel CASSON, TAPA 70 (1939) pp. 3-4. The verso only was reprinted in S.B. VI, 8975, as "P. N.Y.U. Inv. 1001". At present this inventory number cannot be found in the N.Y.U. papyrus collection]. Recto: Private Letter. Provenance unknown, IVp. Verso: Account of Wine. Fayum?, IV/Vp; - 36. Inv. 33 recto (XIVc, 5a). Land List. Oxyrhynchites, ca. 200p; - 37. Inv. 33 verso (XIVc, 5a). List of Land and Expenses. Oxyrhynchites, II/IIIp. - [P. N.Y.U. II, 23-37.]
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. N.Y.U. Inv. 3; 12 verso; 32; 33 recto; 33 verso; 70; 89; 113; 453; 461 recto; 468 verso 145.4 P. Coll. Youtie I, 50 P. N.Y.U. Inv. 468 recto; "1001" recto; "1001" verso
NIELSEN Bruce E. and Klaas A. WORP, New Papyri from the New York University Collection: III.
ZPE 140 (2002) pp. 129-150, 7 figg. et pll. V-X.

Suite de: ZPE 136 (2001) pp. 125-144, 11 figg. et pl. I. - Texts: 23. Inv. 3 (I, 18). Loan of Money. Karanis, 13.viii.326p; - 24. Inv. 70 (XVIII, 34a). Fragment of a Loan. Provenance unknown (Philadelphia?), IIIp?; - 25. Inv. 89 (X, 87). Loan of Money. Oxyrhynchus, 294p; - 26. Inv. 32 (II, 136a = Wolfe 3). Receipt for a Money Loan. Provenance unknown, 29.vi.103p; - 27. Inv. 468 recto (XX, 3) [= S.B. X, 10492]. Receipt for a Money Loan. Provenance unknown, 15.v.163p; - 28. Inv. 468 verso (XX, 3). Account of Expenses / Medical Prescriptions. Provenance unknown, ca. 165-200p; - 29. Inv. 12 recto (II, 136b) [= P. Coll. Youtie I, 50]. Contract of a Loan With Mortgage. Oxyrhynchite nome, early IIp; - 30. Inv. 12 verso (II, 136b = Wolfe 5). Account. Oxyrhynchus, IIp; - 31. Inv. 453. Account. Provenance unknown, IV/V A.D.; - 32. Inv. 461 recto. Account. Oxyrhynchites?, between 341-374 or 381-ca.397p?; - 33. Inv. 113 (IX, 27). Fragment of an Account. Oxyrhynchite nome, IIp; - 34-35. Inv. ? recto and verso (XIX, 1) [ed.: Lionel CASSON, TAPA 70 (1939) pp. 3-4. The verso only was reprinted in S.B. VI, 8975, as "P. N.Y.U. Inv. 1001". At present this inventory number cannot be found in the N.Y.U. papyrus collection]. Recto: Private Letter. Provenance unknown, IVp. Verso: Account of Wine. Fayum?, IV/Vp; - 36. Inv. 33 recto (XIVc, 5a). Land List. Oxyrhynchites, ca. 200p; - 37. Inv. 33 verso (XIVc, 5a). List of Land and Expenses. Oxyrhynchites, II/IIIp. - [P. N.Y.U. II, 23-37.]
